statements.statement:
select KEYTYPE, KEYYEAR, KEYMONTH, KEYDAY, SEGMENT_1, SEGMENT_2, SEGMENT_3, KEYVALUE from [LST_KEYDATA] as kd
kd.KEYTYPE = N'$KEYTYPE$'
kd.KEYYEAR = '$KEYYEAR$'
kd.KEYMONTH = '$KEYMONTH$'
kd.KEYDAY = '$KEYDAY$'
kd.SEGMENT_1 = '$SEGMENT_1$'
kd.SEGMENT_2 = '$SEGMENT_2$'
kd.SEGMENT_3 = '$SEGMENT_3$'
kd.KEYVALUE = '$KEYVALUE$'
statements.update: update LST_KEYDATA set KEYTYPE = #KEYTYPE# , KEYYEAR = #KEYYEAR# , KEYMONTH = #KEYMONTH# , KEYDAY = #KEYDAY# , SEGMENT_1 = #SEGMENT_1# , SEGMENT_2 = #SEGMENT_2# , SEGMENT_3 = #SEGMENT_3# , KEYVALUE = #KEYVALUE# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where KEYTYPE = '$KEYTYPE$' AND KEYYEAR = '$KEYYEAR$' AND KEYMONTH = '$KEYMONTH$' AND KEYDAY = '$KEYDAY$' AND SEGMENT_1 = '$SEGMENT_1$' AND SEGMENT_2 = '$SEGMENT_2$' AND SEGMENT_3 = '$SEGMENT_3$' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
statements.statement:
update LST_KEYDATA WITH (ROWLOCK) set KEYTYPE = #KEYTYPE# , KEYYEAR = #KEYYEAR# , KEYMONTH = #KEYMONTH# , KEYDAY = #KEYDAY# , SEGMENT_1 = #SEGMENT_1# , SEGMENT_2 = #SEGMENT_2# , SEGMENT_3 = #SEGMENT_3# , KEYVALUE = KEYVALUE + 1 OUTPUT INSERTED.* where KEYTYPE = N'$KEYTYPE$' AND KEYYEAR = '$KEYYEAR$' AND KEYMONTH = '$KEYMONTH$' AND KEYDAY = '$KEYDAY$'
SEGMENT_1 = '$SEGMENT_1$'
SEGMENT_2 = '$SEGMENT_2$'
SEGMENT_3 = '$SEGMENT_3$'

SELECT HD.GOITHAU_ID, LST.DICTIONARY_CODE AS MAGOITHAU, LST.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENGOITHAU, HD.NHACUNGCAP_ID, HD.PHAMVI, HDCT.* FROM TM_GIAHOPDONGCHITIET HDCT INNER JOIN TM_GIAHOPDONG HD ON HD.GIAHOPDONG_ID = HDCT.GIAHOPDONG_ID INNER JOIN LST_DICTIONARY LST ON LST.DICTIONARY_ID = HD.GOITHAU_ID
HD.GOITHAU_ID = '$GOITHAU_ID$'
HD.NHACUNGCAP_ID = '$NHACUNGCAP_ID$'
HDCT.DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
UPDATE TM_GIAHOPDONGCHITIET SET SOLUONGDANHAP = '$SOLUONGDANHAP$' WHERE GIAHOPDONGCHITIET_ID = '$GIAHOPDONGCHITIET_ID$'
